dxf.dxfError: The file you tried to upload was not a valid DXF file. Please upload a DXF file to continue.
dxf.intro: This tool converts DXF Files to a custom JSON format and then to SVG in order to display the contents. Just click "Choose a DXF File" to get started. Name your file and click "Download JSON" to download your modified floor plan data in JSON format.
dxf.rawTextPlaceholder: The raw DXF text will be displayed here
dxf.title: DXF File Converter
dxf.titleInputPlaceholder: Enter a name for the output JSON file
